creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly partial gift/partial purchase to the Center from Natalie Fitz-Gerald
description: off-white kimono with abstracted designs in gray, red, and black with some highlights in green and ocher; some black and red kite shapes; gray and black wheel-like shapes, stick figures, etc.
medium: Silk, plain weave, stencil-printed warp and weft threads (heiyō-gasuri meisen)
title: Meisen kimono
